snippet.title: Spawn - In the Demon's Hand (Dreamcast)
snippet.description:
Remember when Spawn was the coolest thing in popular culture? He had a movie in 1997 that was popular at the time, but critics panned. In 2000 this game came along to arcade and Dreamcast. It was produced by Capcom and published in Europa by Eidos. Quite the big names...

The game features a bunch of playable characters from the comics and lots of CPU-only characters that are cannon fodder. The AI is under all critique (as you can see in many places in this video) and.. by God.. your character can not run and reload at the same time, leaving you vulnerable.

Disclamer: This is not a complete run or a long play. We never claim to be pro gamers. We are just showing what the game looks like and how it plays, for your viewing pleasure.
We do not monetize our videos. All copyrights belong to their respective owners.
